analysis.description:
ERC20Token.mintingContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#120-121) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- mint (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#230-240)

Reentrancy in MintingContract.doCommunityMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#308-316):
	External calls:
	- MintableTokenInterface(tokenAddress).mint(_destination,_tokensToMint) (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#314)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comunityMintedTokens (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#314-316)

Reentrancy in MintingContract.doCrowdsaleMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#324-334):
	External calls:
	- MintableTokenInterface(tokenAddress).mint(_destination,_tokensToMint) (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#333-334)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensAlreadyMinted (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#334)

Reentrancy in MintingContract.doPresaleMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#317-324):
	External calls:
	- MintableTokenInterface(tokenAddress).mint(_destination,_tokensToMint) (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#321-322)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensAlreadyMinted (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#322-324)

Reentrancy in MintingContract.doTeamMinting (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#337-347):
	External calls:
	- MintableTokenInterface(tokenAddress).mint(teamTokenAddress,safeSub(crowdsaleMintingCap,tokensAlreadyMinted)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#340-343)
	- MintableTokenInterface(tokenAddress).mint(teamTokenAddress,teamTokensCap) (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#344-347)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- mintingState (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#347)

ERC20Token.salvageTokensFromContract (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#258-272) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20TokenInterface(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/2/0xe7c79deb6a9b74f691d5f882b7c588bba5db1a20.sol#265-272)
